name: Hobo Harvest
description:
Welcome to Hobowood!

What is going on there?? Drugs on the ground, an old nagging woman, Candy the social worker and a donut-loving cop. And of course, Harvy, the big harvester... the biggest threat in Hobowood.

Collect the items and survive the streets.

We created Hobo Harvest during the Ludum Dare 52. Theme was "harvest" and we are a group of four Game Design students (one former) from the IU. We hope you enjoy the trip. :-)
